metadata.title: CVE-2024-4109 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Undertow. An HTTP request header value from a previousstream may be incorrectly reused for a request associated with a subsequentstream on the same HTTP/2 connection. This issue can potentially lead toinformation leakage between requests.

criterions.comment: undertow package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
